TEXT: A lost soul, bound to an artifact, looks to free itself from its curse. NL Finds strength in emptiness.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~empty~ ~one,~ ~let~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire~ ~fill~ ~you."~
